dependencies.@babel/core: Peer dependency of most babel libraries.
dependencies.@babel/polyfill: Used to support modern browser features on older browsers.
dependencies.@babel/preset-env: Dynamically adds support for modern syntax based upon the given environment.
dependencies.@babel/register: Allows modern syntax support to be enabled by importing a module.
dependencies.babel-loader: Provides modern syntax support when bundling for the browser.
dependencies.babel-plugin-root-import: Allows modules to be imported relative to the project root directory.
dependencies.domready: Used to wait for the DOM to be ready.
dependencies.html-webpack-plugin: Automatically creates HTML for rendering the application.
dependencies.react-dom: Renders the UI into a DOM node.
dependencies.react-redux: Integrates the application state with UI components.
dependencies.scientific-notation: Used to parse the scientific notation of musical notes.
dependencies.webpack: Bundles the application for the browser.

devDependencies.babel-eslint: Provides modern syntax support when linting.
devDependencies.babel-plugin-istanbul: Provides modern syntax support when creating test coverage reports.
devDependencies.dirty-chai: Used to allow chai assertions to pass lint checks.
devDependencies.eslint-config-standard: Used as the basis of the linting configuration.
devDependencies.eslint-plugin-mocha: Provides additional linting rules for Mocha tests.
devDependencies.eslint-plugin-react: Provides additional linting rules for React.
devDependencies.nyc: Used to produce code coverage reports.
devDependencies.webpack-serve: Used to serve the application for development.
